setup_script_description: sets focus on the first disclosure button, and sets its state to expanded
task: read information about expanded disclosure button
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, read information about the button.
output_assertions: Name, 'What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?', is conveyed
State of the button (expanded) is conveyed
